Class PurchaseOrderRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mph.controller.PurchaseOrderRestController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/purchaseorder")
@EnableSwagger2
@CrossOrigin(origins="*",
             methods={GET,POST,PUT,DELETE},
             allowCredentials="true",
             allowedHeaders="*")
public class PurchaseOrderRestController
extends java.lang.Object

      • createPurchaseOrder

        @GetMapping("/createpurchaseOrder/{propertyId}/{buyerId}")
public void createPurchaseOrder​(@PathVariable("propertyId")
                                int propertyId,
                                @PathVariable("buyerId")
                                int buyerId)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method creates new order with respect to propertyId and buyerId present in the request path
        Parameters:
        propertyId - unique id of property for which the order needs to be created
        buyerId - used to get information about buyer to place the order
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - raise exception if property is not currently available

      • deletePurchaseOrder

        @DeleteMapping("/deletepurchaseOrder/{purchaseid}")
public void deletePurchaseOrder​(@PathVariable("purchaseid")
                                int purchaseid)
        This method perform operation to delete the purchase order based on their purchase id present in the request path
        Parameters:
        purchaseid - unique id which is used to delete order in the database

      • getOrderByBuyerId

        @GetMapping("/orderbybuyerid/{buyerid}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<PurchaseOrder>> getOrderByBuyerId​(@PathVariable("buyerid")
                                                                                                int buyerId)
        To get all the orders placed by buyer based on the buyer id
        Parameters:
        buyerId - presents in the request path which is used to get orders from the database
